name: Cultural References and Artifacts from Earth - Oracle (for "Ironsworn: Starforged" by Shawn Tomkin)
name_original: Cultural References and Artifacts from Earth - Oracle (for "Ironsworn: Starforged" by Shawn Tomkin)
description:
This is an oracle by Julius Hennig (birb nerb) for the TTRPG 

Ironsworn: Starforged

by Shawn Tomkin.

It contains 25 prompts for items and artifacts from Earth and it was created during the Starforged 2022 Jam on itch.io.

For more infos and a copy of the game, go visit https://www.ironswornrpg.com/product-ironsworn-starforged. 

(v0.1 // 20.05.2022)

Since this is a first draft, feedback is much appreciated here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VO221-zQW_1pPgez5s6KWQC4agiD_0yrQ-71NjUkCAg/...

* * *

If you like this oracle, I'd be super grateful for a good rating as well as a comment for greater visibility! :)
